But then this proves that back when she was all like 'my health is personal and very much ongoing and I won't be discussing it' that was literally just a ploy for attention like a lot of women do as she's now admitted that it was the same issue and the same pain for all these months and the only thing that changed is that after her completely pointless A&E visits she decided to go private.
